title: Shuco with Ranchitas Nacho Cheese
instructions: Step 1: On a grill, toast the hot dog bun and halved sausages.
Step 2: Spread the bread with guacamole, place the cabbage, add Ranchitas to taste, sausage, and finally the mayonnaise, ketchup, and mustard.
Step 3: Accompany by diced onion with parsley.
